message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to its true value.  Would you consider $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm still unable to meet at $15,000. I would like to propose $12,000 for the product.
